dataset_id: SAFARI 2000 SeaWiFS Images for Core Study Sites, 2000-2001
title: SAFARI 2000 SeaWiFS Images for Core Study Sites, 2000-2001
summary: This data set contains Sea-viewing Wide Field-of-view Sensor (SeaWiFS) imagery for the eight core study sites of Mongu, Etosha, Kasangu, Skukuza, Mutoko, Mzola, Nampula, and Ndola. There are two main sets of local area coverage (LAC) data: Level-1 and Level-2 200-km x 200-km image subsets for seven of the sites and 400-km x 400-km image subsets for the Etosha site. The data are provided in HDF format files.
